page.title: 10Schools.
page.content: The schools are Highwood Secondary, which was threatened with closure last year.Horsley Primary School has 50 children in{2}classes with{2}teachers. St.Joseph's R.C.Primary School has 177 children in{6}classes with{7 teachers. All the village children attend school and{2}coaches bring those from Dursley daily.There is a convent swimming pool which the county have rented for the first time this year.All the classes have lessons in it.On Thursday evening there is a Swimming Club,and a Chess Club in Winter.All those children who are{4}start school each September.They stay until they are{11}years old.Some children have hot dinners costing{65p each day while the others bring packed lunches. School is open from{9 a.m.}to 3.15p.m.on Mondays to Fridays.The year is divided into{3}terms of{10-16 weeks the Autumn,Spring and Summer Terms.
